content: Today, you will have the opportunity to receive subsidies from the World Health Organization: New Coronavirus Outbreak Relief Fund of INR50,000 to 100,000 rupee.
In response to a relief plan for theCoronavirus epidemic in India, we are selecting 10,000 Indian citizens every day to give them a chance to get cash!
You only have 5 minutes 00 seconds to answer the questions of the Foundation!
